hazard.description: A set of flood return period hazard maps for Madagascar. Generated by AIR Worldwide as part of GFDRR SWIO-RAFI project.
hazard.value: This data demonstrates a typical hazard data set containing hazard maps for multiple return periods for a key peril.

hazard.description: A set of earthquake return period hazard maps for Madagascar. Generated by AIR Worldwide as part of GFDRR SWIO-RAFI project.
hazard.value: This data demonstrates a typical hazard data set containing hazard maps for multiple return periods for a key peril.

hazard.description: Volcanic ash hazard scenario footprint at Rungwe, Tanzania, for three scenarios, each with 1000 realisations.
hazard.value: This data demonstrates the capability of the schema to include, in a single hazard data set, multiple scenarios and realisations of those scenarios to represent scenario uncertainty.

exposure.value: This dataset shows the capability to host transport network data (line features) with detailed GED4ALL taxonomy ready for risk analysis.

exposure.description: Argentina building data with night-time population (GEM)
exposure.value: This dataset demonstrates the ability to host data that combines structural attributes, replacement cost values and building occupancy (number of people).

exposure.description: Madagascar aggregate building exposure (AIR Worldwide, SWIO-RAFI project).
exposure.value: An example of aggregate building data developed on a raster grid for risk analysis.

loss.description: Return period losses for combined perils in Madagascar (AIR Worldwide, SWIO-RAFI project).
loss.value: Demonstrates AAL losses and EP curve typical of a probabilistic risk assessment, in the risk data schema format.

loss.description: Return period losses for earthquake in Madagascar (AIR Worldwide, SWIO-RAFI project).
loss.value: Demonstrates AAL losses and EP curve typical of a probabilistic risk assessment, in the risk data schema format.

vulnerability.description: Tsunami fragility curves for residential buildings.
vulnerability.value: This example demonstrates the data held for fragility curves relating intensity to the probability of sustaining a given damage state.

vulnerability.description: Earthquake building vulnerability curves for East Africa.
vulnerability.value: This example demonstrates the data held for vulnerbaility curves relating intensity (in this case, MMI) to economic loss.
